about.heading: Professional Summary
about.lead: Dynamic and highly creative software engineer with over 15 years of international experience delivering innovative solutions for leading companies in the US. Recognized for technical leadership, building and empowering high-performance teams, and driving continuous improvement.
about.content: Passionate about contributing as an individual contributor who bridges creativity, technical depth, and collaboration to deliver meaningful results. After a period dedicated to consulting and product R&D, I am eager to bring my expertise in innovation, automation, and digital transformation to forward-thinking organizations.

jobs.title: Independent Consultant & Technology Innovation Leader
highlights: Led digital transformation and automation projects for SMEs and startups, implementing SaaS solutions with clean architecture and modern technologies (Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, Redis) capable of large-scale data processing (>5,000 URLs/hour).
Developed CI/CD pipelines, automated testing (>85% coverage), and comprehensive monitoring (Prometheus, Grafana) for reliable operations.
Managed cloud migrations to improve delivery speed and resilience; mentored teams and promoted documentation and best practices.
Drove product R&D in media intelligence (NLP, sentiment analysis, reputation KPIs) from validation to go-to-market strategy.

jobs.title: Technical Lead – Nissan
highlights: Revitalized critical project by enforcing coding standards, improving efficiency and robustness
Implemented comprehensive unit testing and TDD practices, reducing regressions
Streamlined code review processes and cultivated collaborative team environment
Coordinated with multiple teams to enhance CI/CD processes and restore timely deployments

jobs.title: Technical Lead – Apple
highlights: Led team to improve maintainability, performance, and codebase cleanliness for key products
Utilized Python and modern frontend technologies to optimize features
Oversaw project delivery, including candidate interviews and cross-team communication

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer – Sideqik
highlights: Contributed to an e-commerce influencer marketing platform delivering end-to-end features and integration tests.
Worked with PostgreSQL, Ruby on Rails, Ember and Capybara; provided technical recommendations and database updates.

jobs.title: Front-End Lead – Sephora
highlights: Led front-end team for in-store event management and Beauty Advisor scheduling across US and Canada
Developed core web application components (shopping basket, checkout)
Implemented localization and performance optimization frameworks
Recognized for innovation: Sephora hackathon winner, Maverik Prize nominee
